title: ISSS624
text:
Welcome to ISSS624 Geospatial Analytics Applications, by 1Darren!
In this website, I am going to share with you my learning journey of Geospatial Analytics (under instruction from Prof Kam).
Because Rstudio regularly crashes with Quarto when I try to commit, here is a link menu to my exercises:
